dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents roads in Mali. The Global Map Mali version 2 was developed based on Global Map Specifications version 2.1. The data source was a 1:500,000 map image made in 1960.Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
